languages.text: {n}Церемониймейстер одергивает наряд и нелепо улыбается в ответ — кажется, голос Кибеллы гипнотизирует его.{/n} "В-все для услаждения чувств {mf|Его|Ее} Светлости и {mf|его|ее} очаровательной спутницы..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Церемониймейстер одергивает свой наряд и нелепо улыбается в ответ — кажется, что взгляд и голос Кибеллы гипнотизируют его.{/n} "В-все для услаждения чувств Лорд-капитана и {mf|его|ее} очаровательной спутницы..."

languages.text: {n}The master of ceremonies adjusts his attire and gives you both a ridiculous smile, seemingly hypnotised by the sound of Kibellah's voice.{/n} "A— anything to please {mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship} and {mf|his|her} lovely companion..."
languages.original_text: {n}Церемониймейстер одергивает наряд и нелепо улыбается в ответ — кажется, голос Кибеллы гипнотизирует его.{/n} "В-все для услаждения чувств {mf|Его|Ее} Светлости и {mf|его|ее} очаровательной спутницы..."

traits.locale_text: {n}The master of ceremonies adjusts his attire and smiles ridiculously, seemingly hypnotised by the sound of Kibellah's voice.{/n} "A-anything to please {mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship} and {mf|his|her} lovely companion..."

{n}The master of ceremonies adjusts his attire and smiles ridiculously, seemingly hypnotised by the sound of Kibellah's voice.{/n} "A-anything to please {mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship} and {mf|his|her} lovely companion..."

{n}The master of ceremonies adjusts his attire and gives you both a ridiculous smile, seemingly hypnotised by the sound of Kibellah's voice.{/n} "A— anything to please {mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship} and {mf|his|her} lovely companion..."

{n}The master of ceremonies adjusts his attire and gives you both a ridiculous smile, seemingly hypnotised by the sound of Kibellah's voice.{/n} "A— anything to please {mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship} and {mf|his|her} lovely companion..."

{n}The master of ceremonies adjusts his attire and gives you both a ridiculous smile, seemingly hypnotised by the sound of Kibellah's voice.{/n} "A— anything to please {mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship} and {mf|his|her} lovely companion..."

{n}The master of ceremonies adjusts his attire and gives you both a ridiculous smile, seemingly hypnotised by the sound of Kibellah's voice.{/n} "A— anything to please {mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship} and {mf|his|her} lovely companion..."

languages.text: {n}Der Zeremonienmeister richtet sein Gewand und lächelt euch beide idiotisch an. Er wirkt wie hypnotisiert von Kibellahs Stimme.{/n} "A-Alles, um {mf|seine Lordschaft|ihre Ladyschaft} und {mf|seine|ihre} entzückende Begleitung zu erfreuen ..."
languages.original_text: {n}The master of ceremonies adjusts his attire and gives you both a ridiculous smile, seemingly hypnotised by the sound of Kibellah's voice.{/n} "A— anything to please {mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship} and {mf|his|her} lovely companion..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Zeremonienmeister richtet sein Gewand und lächelt euch beide idiotisch an. Er wirkt wie hypnotisiert von Kibellahs Stimme.{/n} "A-Alles, um {mf|seine Lordschaft|ihre Ladyschaft} und {mf|seine|ihre} entzückende Begleitung zu erfreuen ..."

languages.text: {n}El maestro de ceremonias se ajusta la ropa y os dedica una sonrisa ridícula, aparentemente hipnotizado por la voz de Kibellah.{/n} «L-lo que sea para complacer a mi{mf|lord|lady} y su encantadora acompañante...».
languages.original_text: {n}The master of ceremonies adjusts his attire and gives you both a ridiculous smile, seemingly hypnotised by the sound of Kibellah's voice.{/n} "A— anything to please {mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship} and {mf|his|her} lovely companion..."

traits.locale_text: {n}El maestro de ceremonias se ajusta la ropa y os dedica una sonrisa ridícula, aparentemente hipnotizado por la voz de Kibellah.{/n} «L-lo que sea para complacer a mi{mf|lord|lady} y su encantadora acompañante...».

languages.text: {n}式典のマスターは服装を整えると、キベラの声で催眠術にでもかかったかのように、おかしな笑みを向けてきた。{/n}「か …閣下とお美しいお連れ様を楽しませる何かを…」
languages.original_text: {n}The master of ceremonies adjusts his attire and gives you both a ridiculous smile, seemingly hypnotised by the sound of Kibellah's voice.{/n} "A— anything to please {mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship} and {mf|his|her} lovely companion..."

traits.locale_text: {n}式典のマスターは服装を整えると、キベラの声で催眠術にでもかかったかのように、おかしな笑みを向けてきた。{/n}「か …閣下とお美しいお連れ様を楽しませる何かを…」

languages.text: {n}祭仪大师调整了一下服饰，对你们两人露出了滑稽的笑容，似乎被绮贝菈的声音催眠了一样。{/n}“只……只要能取悦大人您，以及您明艳动人的伴侣……”
languages.original_text: {n}The master of ceremonies adjusts his attire and gives you both a ridiculous smile, seemingly hypnotised by the sound of Kibellah's voice.{/n} "A— anything to please {mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship} and {mf|his|her} lovely companion..."

traits.locale_text: {n}祭仪大师调整了一下服饰，对你们两人露出了滑稽的笑容，似乎被绮贝菈的声音催眠了一样。{/n}“只……只要能取悦大人您，以及您明艳动人的伴侣……”

languages.text: {n}Le maître des cérémonies ajuste sa tenue et vous adresse à {mf|tous|toutes} les deux un sourire ridicule, apparemment hypnotisé par le son de la voix de Kibellah.{/n} « T-tout pour plaire à Sa Seigneurie et à sa charmante compagne... »
languages.original_text: {n}The master of ceremonies adjusts his attire and gives you both a ridiculous smile, seemingly hypnotised by the sound of Kibellah's voice.{/n} "A— anything to please {mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship} and {mf|his|her} lovely companion..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Le maître des cérémonies ajuste sa tenue et vous adresse à {mf|tous|toutes} les deux un sourire ridicule, apparemment hypnotisé par le son de la voix de Kibellah.{/n} « T-tout pour plaire à Sa Seigneurie et à sa charmante compagne... »

languages.text: {n}Kibellah'nın sesiyle hipnotize olmuş gibi görünen teşrifatçı, kıyafetini düzelterek facia gülümsemesini ikinize birden yöneltiyor.{/n} "{mf|Lord|Leydi Hazretleri} ile kıymetli yoldaşını memnun etmek için ne... Ne gerekiyorsa..."
languages.original_text: {n}The master of ceremonies adjusts his attire and gives you both a ridiculous smile, seemingly hypnotised by the sound of Kibellah's voice.{/n} "A— anything to please {mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship} and {mf|his|her} lovely companion..."
